So freaking small for being a medium it is really a small or even extra small order like would kids clothes

评论概述: Ok quality. But I have my worries
评论详情: First issue I had immediately because it was shipped directly in the clear thin garment bag and there was multiple rips and scuffs, so my delivered item also had damages. Zero privacy and protection.  Second issue I take is that this is not at all the quality you'd expect for the price. The zippers are horrible, as many other reviews state. The sizing is off an incredible amount. I normally wear a large for fitted looks, id buy XL for some room. I am a 32G so I normally do size up for chest room. I thought am XL would work, but after reading the reviews I opted for XXL. The XXL size fits exactly like a large would. Thankfully it is pretty much how I wanted it to fit so I guess that was worth it?  But, it arrived with damages, and was shipped inappropriately imo which caused that. And then left out on my porch where anyone could see exactly what I ordered (including thieves) and in the weather with large holes in the thin packaging. All around the entire experience was something I expect from a $15 item.  The one thing I would give credit for is that it at least does seem like it will be warm for what I needed it for. But for the price I paid that's literally the least it could do. This isn't worth the price.
I would order up a size. I love my Jacket ❤️

I was a  little skeptical about the size of the jacket because some clothing you have to buy them a little smaller or bigger depending on the fabric bit this jacket fitted perfectly with me. Excellent I wear it every time I go out.
Cute and comfy jacket. The sleeves and hood are a sweatshirt material, nice and warm.
I love this jacket.

I really like the look and wear somewhat regularly, but with the weather getting colder, the liner is inadequate to say the least. The first time I tried this on and stuck my hand in the pocket, the seam inside ripped apart, about a week later, the second pocket liner had split as well. The two zippers at the top are not pockets, only the zipper for the look. The removable liner is great, the zippers are good quality, honestly if the liner was the same material at the hoodie insert, I would be getting this in multiple colors.
A little tight. I would size up. However exactly what I was looking for. Beautiful!!
This jacket is wonderful quality however, a xxl will fit you like a M.

Fits perfectly, keeps me warm without being too hot. The leather is soft and flexible. Zipper works nicely. The pockets also have zippers which I like. It does fit true to size so if you want a little more room, size up.
Please people do not order this jacket! It’s very beautiful but I ordered a size xx large and it was a size small! It said xxl on jacket but it’s totally wrong! Very disappointed

I love the jacket. It fits perfectly and I love the extra material on the ends of the sleeves because I have long arms. Great for tall girls!
This jacket is made for a middle schooler it is tiny.  Size up.
Me gustó mucho, pedí una talla más para que me quedara floja. Mi única sugerencia es que quisiera un bolsillo interno.

The color is great and so is the fit.
Nice construction. Good materials. Runs a little slim. My daughter loved it!

It was my daughters Christmas present.

I loved my jacket. Comfortable, size correct for this need to go up from usual size. Smooth materials.  Durable. Great thickness, the ability to take hood of and wear without perfect. Dress up or casual.
This jacket was exactly what she wanted. The fit was perfect. Well made, nice quality for the price. Would definitely order this again.
Daughter was so happy with this jacket  she received several compliments
Loved it, will be getting a black one & grey one soon for my bday.
Jacket looks and feels good. Size tuns tho very small. Got hands into sleeves (length is good on sleeves) and could not even move them. Was not possible to finish trying the jacket on 😲😳.
Very nice jacket fits great. Soft and stretchy. Excellent price.
Nice but runs small

Ordered the largest one. The XXL and it was still very small. Fits my 12 year old son perfectly though so we let him have it. Watching my wife try this coat is was like watching a " Big man in a little coat". Or a 6 foot man that's 350 lbs driving a Fiat 500. If you generally wear Large DO not buy this brand. The XXL is more like the American Small.

I ordered an XXL. My bust size is 44” and the website description says this is 48” bust. I’m a good 8” from being able to zip it up. My husband wears a Large sometimes M and he could barely get the jacket on. It didn’t come anywhere close to zipping up on him either. The material of this jacket is beautiful and actually looks real leather! The gold detail is truly chefs kiss as I don’t wear anything silver! I’m so bummed this runs so incredibly small :(
Product looks similar, fits nicely... but it's not what what advertised. I'll keep it because I like it, but this is am bait and switch

I love The feel of the jacket and It's a pretty good weight however, You need to size up. It's pretty small in the arms and under the arm. I ordered my size, but it was very small so I did order another one. And it fits way better.
This item was a great . Really did like it but too small. Disappointed they didn't have my size because I would have re-ordered this product.

Really cute and fit perfect. Lasted about a month and a half before the seam of one of the sleeves ripped. I didn't expect anything super high quality, but I had hoped it would've lasted a little longer than that for the price.
Pero no corresponde la talla que se pide
I’ve had it for a very short amount of time and it’s already falling apart. The outside zipper is ripping off and the faux leather material is peeling and the threads are coming out

I first bought this coat 8 years ago and I really liked it. The leather eventually started peeling, so I bought another. Unfortunately, this new one smells terribly of fish. I haven't figured out how to get rid of the smell. I can't wear the coat out because it can be smelled from a distance.

评论概述: Don’t listen to the “recommended size” guide
评论详情: Based on my clothing size, I was recommended to buy a Medium. I figured I like to have room in jackets so I ordered 3 different ones in Large. They are all skin tight! The fabric on all 3 was nice, but I can’t wear any of them. I’m so disappointed. I’m not going to buy a larger size; just returning them.

I get compliments on this jacket all the time. I have the maroon and black and mix/match the removable hoodie insert. Can’t speak more highly my friends. Let’s keep supporting them so they can keep these jackets!!
Great fit and true to size. Really love this item!
The size XL is Large

It definitely runs small in certain areas. Snug around the arms and torso.  After reading reviews I decided to size up. I typically wear and medium or Large. It depends on the brand. I ordered this jacket in XL. It fit snugged around the arms and torso. It fits big on the shoulders and the length of the sleeves.  I have long arms and the jacket sleeve was still long on me.  If I place my arms straight down the sleeve covers more than half my hand.  The quality of the jacket seems good. The color is as expected. I’m 160lb and 5.7.  Id buy from this seller again but I’d order a Large. Hope my review helps someone :)

I ordered an XL and  it fit like a medium. Usually I wear a large. I wanted room in it so I could wear a sweater under it and it still have room. When I got it I couldn’t even fit my bare arm in it and forget trying to zip it. It was way, way too small.

I ordered this jacket and a size larger than I normally wear so that I could wear a sweater underneath it. I got the jacket in an extra large tried it on and the chest area barely fit. I could zip it, but the sleeves were so tight they were uncomfortable. So I returned it and bought a double extra large. It came this morning. The jacket is even smaller than the original jacket I could not zip it or get my arms all the way into the sleeves. It appears to be really nicely made the weight of it is nice the hood and the lining detach from it, which is exactly what I was looking for so that I could wear it in more than one season The same seem to be nice. The zippers are a nice heavy weight, but it does not align with the sizes that are on the chart nor are they sized consistently since the xxl was actually smaller than the xl. I normally wear a large.

The jacket looks really stylish and fits well, but the material feels kind of stiff and not super comfortable. The hood is a nice touch, but it’s thin and feels a bit cheap. It’s okay for the price, but I was expecting better quality.

I love this it looks great feels great and it keeps me warm. I thought it would be just for looks but I'm sweating when I wear it with more than 1 layer under it. The leather feels great and it thin but thick all in one. It stretches and holds up really well with every day activities. I only wash it and hang dry it so that it doesn't Crack or shrink. So far so good. Would definitely recommend.

This is one of the worst products I’ve ever received from Amazon.  I’m quickly learning that the Chinese do not size their clothes to fit American women.That being said, I have to go to the trouble of sending the jacket back.  It’s a very cute jacket with zippers.  But VERY small.
I love this jacket! It is true to size. Very comfortable. 10/10 I would recommend.

It's a good, substantial fake leather. It'll keep you warm. Two things keep it from getting 5 stars out of me. 1.) The removable hood is really thin, so why bother? 2.) Whoever packed my jacket has obviously never heard of a lint roller. Someone's dog hair was all over it.  It's got two zip-up options. You can zip the inner removable layer or the outer "leather" layer. I find that it gets a little tight under the arms when I zip the outer layer, and it mashes the boobage a bit. So I wear it with the inner layer zipped up, and the outer layer half-zipped. Then it fits fine.
Super cute but arms are tight
I love it, beautiful faux leather jacket! I wear size 4/6 and I ordered a medium.
I love the material and how warm it's is it's a bit small but I needed a goal now I got it 😁

Love this jacket. It is thin and light weight. Definitely size up. I'm in-between a l-xl and i sized up to a XXL. It's very tight in the chest and it is a short cut.  Sizing up didn't cause it to look bulky at all
Size up two sizes!!!!

I can truthfully say that this jacket was the worst fitting jacket of my life.  If I could give it a zero rating, I would!  I tried to find a size that fit, but none of the sizes from small, medium, large, and xl fit.  Mostly, the issues were in the shoulder area.  I'm 5'6" and 135 lbs.  Not large by any stretch of the imagination.  Needless to say, I'm returning all sizes, much to my dismay.  I wanted this jacket to work, but it just didn't.  Boo!

评论概述: Nice jacket, a bit tight and zips rough
评论详情: The jacket is nice, looks nice on. I typically wear a medium/large (depending on how much denial the brand is in on making their sizes realistic) but this jacket seems to run quite small. I like a nice fit without the bunching that happens when it’s too snug. This one is a little snug around the upper arms and waist compared to other jackets I wear that are similar to this one. I even upped the size based on other reviews from my go-to large to a mind blowing XXL which will literally be the largest sized anything I’ve ever bought for myself. The material seems nice and I really like the zipped in hoodie for removal for washing. My biggest gripe is how it was shipped. While I’m all for foregoing the excessive packaging when possible, shipping a leather-like item with no exterior packaging is a gamble I wouldn’t take. I was lucky enough not to receive a scuffed or damaged jacket, but it definitely needs to be shipped inside a bubble envelope at the very least.
The product runs very small. I loved everything else about it but it was just too small to even be wearable

评论概述: Sizing up seems to result in the same size in the shoulders
评论详情: I have a size medium I bought several years ago. I have since had a baby and my chest is now wider and so my current size medium doesn’t fit anymore. I have now purchased the large and extra large and the distance between the shoulders is smaller than my size medium. The large and extra large are the same size in the shoulders as each other. It’s incredibly stupid and frustrating. If they just sized that part up slightly I would love this jacket. I loved the medium when it fit me. What a shame they don’t know how to increase sizing besides just the front panels.

I have been purchasing these jackets for many years and have always been thrilled with the quality and fit. HOWEVER, while I just ordered the same size as always, the Med is suddenly running much smaller.  I just purchased replacements in the same size/colors i have had but will be returning for a refund because they are too small across the shoulders, chest, and upper torso. See image for comparison of previously purchased M to what i just received. You can clearly see the wine and chicolate (just purchased) are cut significantly smaller than the camel one I have had. I also have this exact jacket style in black, gray, and taupe, ALL size M. That's how much I have loved them in the past. It saddens me to know the fit and material quality has changed!!! Material seems thinner as well.

Ordered XL; tight in the back when it should be a little big on me. I would size up by 2 times. Can’t wear anything too bulky underneath. Not bad for the price. Expected the hoodie to be sweatshirt material and it’s not. Cheap slippery material. Makes the cost look cheap. Taking it out.

Decent jacket. Had a very strange odor to it when it arrived. Sleeves are way too long but down a size would’ve been tight in the shoulders. Had a whole in the one sleeve, felt like it wouldn’t last. Returned
5’7 - 125 lbs and I got the small..wanted it fitted. Still some room and super comfortable.
Bought this and fits great and great quality
The jacket is great quality and beautiful, but the sizing is way off and runs very small.
The jacket is a nice fit i should of ordered a size small i ordered a medium im 5'2 119 pounds i read the reviews that this jacket runs small but knowing its a little big im still going to wear it

Under normal circumstances I wear a large in shirts but size up to XL for jackets because I like the extra room. I got an XXL for this and I'm glad I did because it's still a little tight across the shoulders still. I haven't tried to zip it up because I was going to use as apart of a costume. Because of the XXL size though the sleeves are just a little too long on me. In the jackets favor however it is on the heavy side and very comfy looking forward to having it in the colder seasons. I do recommend because it's a nice jacket just make sure you size up 1 to 2 sizes.

Got this on a lightning deal and I'm so glad I snagged one! I feel super fantastic in this jacket. It's not too heavy. Has some spunk but not too edgy. It looks like I paid a lot for it but didn't blow the budget. It isn't a full sweatshirt inside but the hood is detachable. All the pockets have zippers. I really like this coat.  Note: size up. I normally wear a large but I wanted a little extra room so I grabbed an XXL. I'm glad I did. Large would have been way too small, XL would have been tight.

I love these jackets! I’ve re-ordered them and have it in black as well! These are perfect for a fall chill. Can be worn as a casual jacket or in all black looks a little classier. These last great too! I’ve had one over a year and it still looks great!

I ordered based on the sizes listed on the size chart- in particular the bust size as I am larger chested. I generally wear a M or L top, but am careful to check charts and reviews.  According to the chart, I should have been comfortably in a L jacket. However, it barely zipped and I was tighter in the arms as well.I returned it and would have ordered another, but the price was suddenly double!  I can't see paying twice as much for the same item literally days later because of an inaccurate size chart.  Pity.  I'll have to look elsewhere now.

评论概述: Jacket too short and sleeves too long. Description says removable hood, but it does not have one.
评论详情: The description says it has a removable hood, but there was no removable hood with this jacket.  So, the description is misleading.  Nice jacket, though; seems like it's of good quality.  However, returning it because the jacket is too short and the sleeves are too long.
Esta muy lindo y de buenísima calidad lo que es reducida la talla

评论概述: Runs small. Good for short arms
评论详情: I’m 5’9” 135# and usually wear a size small or XS.  I got this in a Medium. The body fit fine, it was not at all large, but big enough (although not big enough to wear more than a tshirt under). But the arms were too short and a bit tight.It’s going back. Have to return it. If you order, definitely size up and if you want to layer anything under it, go up 2 sizes.  And if you are all (with limbs to match) skip this one.
Love this jacket, feels like good quality and looks great, but the arms are super skinny. If you have thicker arms, order at least one size up or this will NOT work!

I was impressed by the look of this jacket. It didn't have that "fake" leather-look. If unsure of size, order up. I ordered a medium, which was the manufacturer's measurements, but a little too snug in the bust. Returned it for a large. Not much more room in the bust, but maybe just a little. Noticed the sleeves were a little longer in the large. For reference: 5'4", 137lbs, bust is 39".

评论概述: Super cute if you are 110 lbs and have XX long arms!
评论详情: Its so cute, I wish it fit!!!! Seems cozy and warm. I'm usually size M to L. I knew this would run small due to the reviews. I ordered XX large and it was still too small in the length. I could zip it up barley and the arms were WAY too long. I don't know who this will fit but it will look super cute for the right person.
The jacket was exactly perfect. Love this color and is classy without a doubt. Will look great dressed up or casual.

I ordered in a size medium because I wanted a “fitted” look. I will not be able to wear a sweater under it but I’m fine with that. A turtleneck or a shirt is sufficient. I was surprised with the texture of the jacket. It was super soft. I love the hood you can remove too. I feel like I got a 2 in 1 with this jacket. It’s lightweight. Has no smell. Just an all around great quality jacket. Looking forward to wearing it out. I might update with a photo.

评论概述: Largest size bought, not big tiddy friendly
评论详情: Everything about this jacket was great, except for the fit around the breast area. Too small, couldn't zip past the chest area and I even got the largest size to accommodate for this. Wish they made it in a bigger size!
